title: Define Project Scope and Requirements: WellnessIntegrator
description:
Gather and document detailed project requirements, including features, functionalities, target audience, integration points with existing systems (HR, payroll, health insurance providers), clear guidelines on data privacy and security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, compliance with specific regulations or industry standards. Identify potential roadblocks, assumptions, or constraints in the requirement gathering process. The detailed scope will break down each feature with its associated sub-features if necessary. This will serve as the foundation for the WellnessIntegrator project.

Please note that, due to the nature of this task, it's recommended to collaborate closely with the Project Manager and other relevant team members (Task Decomposer) to ensure comprehensive coverage.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points with external systems or APIs.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services and APIs required for the wellness program, including data storage, processing, and integration with external resources.

title: Build Frontend User Interface
description: Develop the frontend user interface for the wellness program, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience for employees.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management solution for the wellness program, ensuring data integrity, security, and scalability.

title: Integrate External Services and APIs
description: Integrate the wellness program with external services and APIs for physical, mental, and financial health resources.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the wellness program adheres to security and compliance standards, including data privacy, user authentication, and access control.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the wellness program, enabling automated testing, building, and deployment.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user documentation, training materials, and support resources to assist employees in effectively utilizing the wellness program.
